Html: I have been able to successfully read form an xlsx file. I get a lot of errors when I try and read from an xls file? Is there a way of being able to access xls files also?

Yes, it should be possible to read xls files using PHPExcel_Reader_Excel5. If you are getting errors using PHPExcel 1.6.4, can you then try with latest source code:
http://www.codeplex.com/PHPExcel/SourceControl/ListDownloadableCommits.aspx

If you are still getting errors, please send me the file you are trying to read to <erik at phpexcel dot net> so I can inspect.

Thanks for providing the necessary info per email. This had to do with deleted sheet references in formulas. Work item #8795 created and fixed:
http://www.codeplex.com/PHPExcel/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=8795
